metadata.description: ML experiment tracking and benchmarking tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: benchmark
plugins.description: Comprehensive ML/AI benchmarking skill that guides users through rigorous experiment design, execution, and analysis using xetrack

plugins.name: git-versioning
plugins.description: ML experiment versioning with Git + DVC + xetrack. Manage sequential/parallel/worktree workflows, merge/rebase experiment artifacts, model promotion, and experiment exploration
